trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other types to and from <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> instances.

<xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.GridLengthConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether a class can be converted from a given type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref>.

<xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
Describes the context information of a type.
The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
`true` if the converter can convert from the specified type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> can be converted to a different type.

<xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
Describes the context information of a type.
The desired type that this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> is being evaluated for conversion.
`true` if the converter can convert this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> to the specified type; otherwise, `false`.
Attempts to convert a specified object to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref>.

<xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
Describes the context information of a type.
Cultural specific information that should be respected during conversion.
The object being converted.
The instance of that is created from the converted source.
source object is `null`.
source object is not `null` and is not a valid type that can be converted to a .
Attempts to convert an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> to a specified type.

<xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
Describes the context information of a type.
Cultural specific information that should be respected during conversion.
The instance of <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> to convert.
The type that this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> is converted to.
The object that is created from the converted instance of <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref>.
destinationType is not one of the valid types for conversion.
value is `null`.
